resources.string: The Demonstration Binding Service is demonstrating your sevice.
The Demonstration Messaging Service is demonstrating your sevice.
The service is not available to do this.
This activity is won\'t risk doing this. There may be outstanding permissions.
The service won\'t risk doing this. There may be outstanding permissions.
The binding demonstration service has been created.
The binding demonstration service has been destroyed.
The messaging demonstration service has been created.
The messaging demonstration service has been destroyed.

This app manages an ongoing Service that runs with a notification to help Android prioritise it highly enough to keep it operational in the background. \n\nThere are two background services running: the DemonstrationBindingService (to which this Activity is bound), and the DemonstrationMessagingService which can receive inter-process messages from other apps (although in this case you will be sending messages from the same process).

This app demonstrates how to implement a long-running background Service, and how to bind to it safely from your Activities.
